docna.cdata!:
Colombia - Coal Exploration Project : Loan
            2349 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Colombia - Coal Exploration
            Project : Loan 2349 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Colombia - Coal Exploration Project : Loan
            2349 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Colombia - Coal Exploration
            Project : Loan 2349 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project consists of
            primarily one objective which will provide Colombia with two
            elements essential to coal exploration. The first includes
            an: (a) evaluation and assessment of potential economic
            exploitation of coal reserves in some of Colombia's
            most promising coal-bearing areas. Secondly, the project
            aims to provide funds for the; (b) institutional
            strengthening of Carbocol to help it discharge its growing
            responsibilities. In order to achieve these ends, this
            project plans to incorporate two components: (a) a coal
            exploration component; and (b) one for technical assistance.
            The coal exploration component is aimed at identifying
            thermal coal deposits, evaluating coal reserves and
            assessing the technical and economic viability of deposits
            in six areas. The component on technical assistance includes
            expert advice and assistance on: (a) marketing; (b) coal
            exploration; (c) financial planning; and (d) contracting for
            coal development.
